hypotheses.title: NATO may build up icebreakers to better control Arctic routes.
NATO may run more readiness exercises to improve route control in the Arctic.
NATO may build up icebreakers to keep Arctic access secure.
NATO may build up icebreakers to strengthen deterrence in the Arctic.
NATO may run more readiness exercises to reinforce deterrence in the Arctic.
NATO may run more readiness exercises to secure access in the Arctic.
NATO may deepen alliance integration to improve Arctic route control.
NATO may deepen alliance integration to strengthen deterrence in the Arctic.
NATO may deepen alliance integration to secure Arctic access.

intelligence_requirement: Long-term changes in regional security and military activity in the Arctic Sea region
